cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Comfortable shared room, our premium 6-bed option. All bunks include privacy curtains, reading lights, USB & electrical charging ports, two pillows, ready made linen and towel included as standard.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Comfortable shared room, our premium 4-bed option. All bunks include privacy curtains, reading lights, USB & electrical charging ports, two pillows, ready made linen and towel included as standard. Ensuite bathroom adjoining this room.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 7th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 7th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
